title: The Vaccine Center | Boston Medical Center
description: The Vaccine Center not only investigates new vaccines, but also is on the cutting edge of information regarding new indications. Advice on appropriate immunizations for a variety of populations such as sickle cell disease, immunodeficiency, splenectomized patients is also available.
